website_summaries.verdict: The divided lid and interior divider offers organized storage and easy access in this model, which can maintain ice for up to five days.
pros: The long-term ice maintenance capability is this model's primary benefit
It also gets high marks for being able to keep different foods or drinks separate with its divided lid and internal divider
Even when filled, the wheels on this model make transport no problem
cons: Because they are smaller than those on a larger lid, the hinges on the divided lid may snap more easily than some models

customer_reviews.title: These really work!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a couple of these for a wedding. Due to logistics, I needed one to keep 18 bottles of champagne cold for 3 days and another filled with beer and soda. They worked like a charm. The champagne one which was kept closed still had lots of ice on the third day as did the other one which saw constant opening and closing. Temps were in the 80's.
customer_reviews.author: KimA

customer_reviews.title: For the price, I like it
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a Yetti, but it get's the job done. I purchased this for a music festival and it kept everything cold for a full 5 days. For such a cheap price, it's probably the way to go over spending $400 for the same size comparable one.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Broken Handle after 1st use.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box , one of the white handles was poorly installed and a metal reinforcement piece stuck out about 1/2". I tried to push the handle back-in a little because I needed the cooler for a camping trip the following day. After my adjustment the handle reinforcement was still exposed about 1/4". After the first use, the blue plastic reinforcement to secure the handle is now half way ripped. I'll likely only get one more use before the handle breaks for good. The other handle held up, but the quality control to ship a visible defective product is poor. I will go through the return process with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ridley

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly the same unit that I had for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the same unit that I had for my business... The other one broke... It did last several years... I`m in and out of it 3000 plus times per year... Draining the cooler 200 plus times... For anyone looking for a large cooler for family use, this will last much longer than mine. I rate this 5 stars..
customer_reviews.author: Martin G.

customer_reviews.title: Such great coolers! We bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when they were on sale. Such great coolers! We bought 2. I like that the handle to wheel them is not telescopong. Seems like most coolers on wheels have a handle that pulls out. In my experience those tend to break. This one is durable. Like being able to reach in and grab without opening the lid. Especially nice for camping whe you need the ice to last a lomg time. Great purchase for us! So happy with these coolers
customer_reviews.author: Rblackburn

customer_reviews.title: Fishy Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Love the cooler but the quality of the hinges leaves something to be desired. We used the cooler merely to transport our catch home from vacation twice. Other than the two one-way transports we have not used the cooler. I was shocked to notice today that one of the hinges is broken in half. Not a big deal, but an inconvenience to now track down replacement hinges. We work hard to catch our fish, clams, crabs and oysters for the winter. Needless to say, it would be very upsetting to arrive home with 75 quarts of defrosted seafood.
customer_reviews.author: Critter Gitter

customer_reviews.title: Defective Hinge, Broken & Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I just got my cooler yesterday, it was delivered by UPS I’m this giant opened tire up box! I went to inspect the cooler and the hinge is broken! I’m very disappointed. Also the black pulling handle is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Like this very much
customer_reviews.text: used for the first time this past weekend. the frozen gallon of water was just as frozen after 7 hours of riding in a hot car as it was when I started. Brought frozen food that also remained frozen. Like this very much. Keep in mind that this cooler is very large. ff full it will be quite heavy. When full do not plan on moving it around alot. It is almost like a mini chest freezer.
customer_reviews.author: jimfog

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: you need to change from "Running late" to "Delivered" --- this ice chest is just totally awesome !!!
customer_reviews.author: RSC

customer_reviews.title: Seems to leak a lot of cold out. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to leak a lot of cold out. The outside of the cooler (while sitting in my kitchen) got condensation and felt cold to the touch. This leads me to believe that it isn't insulated enough. Holds quite a bit for camping.
customer_reviews.author: DtotheB

customer_reviews.title: Nice it has wheels
customer_reviews.text: Used it a couple of times it's big. Takes the place of the two we used to use. We fill it with refilled water bottles (the ones that come in packs of 12 they're quite small) stays cold for the day. Nice it has wheels, it's heavy.
customer_reviews.author: sparsparkster

customer_reviews.title: Practical and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I ordered this cooler. Easy to move with the wheels and large handle, and it keeps ice well . The longest I have had to was about 48 hours and the ice kept well. The two part lids is very useful also and the size in keeping with the 75 quarts stated. I got it for $39.95, but I note that the price is now over $60. Glad I bought it when I did.
customer_reviews.author: Pali

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Lid broke 1 st time we used it and no one would take it back
customer_reviews.author: Marlaine

customer_reviews.title: the size is great and the wheels and roller handle work well
customer_reviews.text: I used this cooler for the first time this week and when I lifted it by the handle to get it down a step out of my house, the handle snapped in my hand. Sadly, it's past the return window so I'm not sure what can be done, but I'm hoping Amazon or Rubbermaid will be willing to replace the cooler. Otherwise, the size is great and the wheels and roller handle work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. So far its been great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. So far its been great. Sits in the sun in back of work truck in florida weather and ice doesnt melt so thats pretty amazing
customer_reviews.author: miamia

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Easily fit enough food for a family of four on a four day camping trip - including beer :) Food stayed nice and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: I love the double lid it makes it so convenient because you always have everything on the ice chest.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany sando

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that you only have to open one side of the top. Great cooler for the price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna W.

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler! Hold a lot
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler! Hold a lot, the split lid is awesome and it keeps stuff cold. It is my second best cooler, the best on is marine grade.
customer_reviews.author: Macha Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler keeps ny cans cold for more than 6 hours... it's really good. High capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Bran

customer_reviews.title: use it around for gardening
customer_reviews.text: great size easy to move easy to load use it around for gardening
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He is Going to Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for father's day :) He is going to Love it! Looks great, surprisingly light (empty of course), and the handles and wheels are conveniently placed and stylishly subtle! Yay :)
customer_reviews.author: AmbearTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: the lid broke off because its just held on with 4 crappy screws.
customer_reviews.text: After a while, the lid broke off because its just held on with 4 crappy screws.
customer_reviews.author: Jason James Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: In an attempt to keep frozen milk frozen through a cross country trip from California to Florida, I was skeptical about how this cooler would hold up. Through a multiple day journey however I was pleasantly surprised to find all milk still frozen. Would highly recommend for situations in which someone needs to keep items frozen for long periods of time with little upkeep.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Fox

customer_reviews.title: Hinges break
customer_reviews.text: Maintains food temperature for 2-3 days but hinges broke during first trip with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L. Ristich

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I thought. I love that it is wheeled and has a handle. Also love the split top.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: One of the lids blew off the first time I had it in the back of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: it would do just fine. I had 70 juice boxes and 20 pounds ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I would consider a five day cooler. It's well built, and if all you need is a cooler for a day trip, it would do just fine. I had 70 juice boxes and 20 pounds of ice and it was melted in 26 hours. My igloo 5 day performed much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must say this is the best cooler ever
customer_reviews.text: Must say this is the best cooler ever. It is large enough for me. I only go to town once a month, cooler stays in the car, keeps things chilled, and Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: hawaiiano

customer_reviews.title: I actually filled out the review on the 50 quart ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually filled out the review on the 50 quart one by mistake. It doesn't keep ice for one day in an air conditioned home.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good simple cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good simple cooler. The only drawback is that the drain is up too high, and the cooler has to be tilted in order to drain the water out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. a little large but keep a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. a little large but keep a lot of food. I followed instruction and really can keep food for 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Yue

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price. Drain hole is not low enough to the bottom. Lid could use better way to be secured. Overall happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler you'll ever buy
customer_reviews.text: Woks great. Keeps food cold and fresh and very easy to wheel around. Has a lot of space and it built very well.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Smith

customer_reviews.title: The cooler is wonderful size for trips and does keep things cooler than ...
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is wonderful size for trips and does keep things cooler than a typical cooler, but not the full 3 days claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cooler
customer_reviews.text: seriously huge. I didn't realize how big it was until it arrived in the mail. I love it though! it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kranke

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hardware
customer_reviews.text: We did like it, but the second time we used it, one hinge snapped in half on the top lid and the other has the screws pulling loose. There was no foul play or rough handling with the lids at all, it was not overfilled, and we were careful opening the lids. The hinges are made of a cheap plastic, they were not durable enough. We literally only got two uses out of it and it may have been opened maybe 20 times. I expected it to last more than the 3 months we had it.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold, holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps drinks cold for days. Still have ice after two days. Had 4 cases of drinks and still had room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Tigbot

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: perfect - I love that it has a dual open top easy roll wheels and two handles to make it easy to grip and pull to move
customer_reviews.author: nm friedman

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is huge!! It hold so much & really durable. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel  Taylor

customer_reviews.title: No way 5 days
customer_reviews.text: I am calling BS on this cooler. It does not hold ice for 5 days. 40 lbs of ice were gone in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Feeney

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. We bought it for camping, and for the first time did not have to replace the ice in a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: OSBURNLEY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loaded it with drinks and ice for a party on Monday. It's still cold on Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn A

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once, but I am very pleased with my purchase. I stored my food in this cooler for 2 days when my freezer malfunctioned. I am happy to report that my food remained solidly frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Ladelta

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with hinge split . May not hold up to moderate use
customer_reviews.author: Jules T. Frere

customer_reviews.title: Latch came in broken.
customer_reviews.text: Latch came in broken. It was too much to send it back so I just bought a new latch and replaced it
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a 5 day, but gets the job done for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, kept things cold
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler, kept things cold. Was a little hard to wheel once it was loaded, tires seem almost too small
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Abrantes

customer_reviews.title: Hinge broke when we opened the lid
customer_reviews.text: First time we used this cooler the screws came out of the hinge that opens the lid , not happy with that at all. It does keep things cold
customer_reviews.author: Jim O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its serves its purpose. But the actual product turned out to be slightly bigger than what was found online
customer_reviews.author: punters

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed that the lid cracked off the second time we used this.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a fundraiser and it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best cooler! Kept our stuff ice cold for five days. Great deal and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ice lasts only hours
customer_reviews.text: We used this camping over a week, purchased specifically for the trip. It was hot maybe 90 degrees at midday, but was kept in the shade. Ice was completely water in a matter of hours. Useless, unless you just need dry good storage. I gave it two stars because it was hot and outside the entire time, but I feel like we should at least get a day out of something rated for five, certinly not hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mosher Trading

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it to party at college and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a big cooler for music festivals and this definitely is that. It is big and tall, the wheels survived a muddy music festival, it seemed to keep my stuff cold for 4 good days (with help of dry ice) and it has handy cup holdrs on top
customer_reviews.author: J Lew

customer_reviews.title: Ice Is Water After 3 Days
customer_reviews.text: 5 Days? NOT! We got 3 days in 77 degree weather (cooler was sitting in the shade) before our ice was almost all water. It's a good cooler, but with a name like "Extreme 5-Day", I would have expected to still have most of my ice after 3.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hart

customer_reviews.title: Cools great, but doesn’t haul well
customer_reviews.text: This cooler did a great job at keeping the food cold. However, the handle is a big problem. It's so short that as you are walking, the cooler keeps bumping into the backs of your legs. It makes for a very awkward haul.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D.

customer_reviews.title: Best cost for this sized cooler
customer_reviews.text: Best cost for this sized cooler. It has the drain spout, carrying handle, wheels, and even cup holding spots on the lid. Can't find a better deal
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge!
customer_reviews.text: Huge, but the price was great! It had some minor flaws with foam coming out of the seam, but it's cosmetic and doesn't hurt the structural integrity of this cooler. I wouldn't recommend carrying by the long handle, as it seems flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Nic E

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I agonized over this purchase. I shopped around, read reviews, then looked for the best I could find in a price range that wouldnt' break me. So far, so good. I used it on a really hot day to keep ice for a party and the next day (even though we opened the cooler a few times to get ice for drinks there was still alot of frozen ice inside. The real test will be a 3 day camping weekend coming up soon.
customer_reviews.author: Susan QuincyMA

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the hinges broke right away. I can't find replacement ones anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Wrango

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't keep ice close to advertisement. Top broke after 2 months and can't get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Hangebrauck

customer_reviews.title: ( I do not have any faith that they will hold up to even light use...I'm sorry because I was really excited to get this cooler for
customer_reviews.text: Just received this cooler and one hinge was already broken upon receipt. The hinges are quite flimsy :( I do not have any faith that they will hold up to even light use...I'm sorry because I was really excited to get this cooler for such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: These are GIGANTIC, nearly could fit them both in ...
customer_reviews.text: These are GIGANTIC, nearly could fit them both in my car. But they do their job very well. They sat for four days under direct summer sunlight and kept our stuff cold the entire time. We put dry ice in one and had to get a tent stake and a mallet to break up the ice to get to something, and put just ice in the other and had it keep everything cold till we left (though the ice did mostly melt on day 3)
customer_reviews.author: Caroline P.

customer_reviews.title: I had to set it on fire.
customer_reviews.text: Son decided to use it as a bird cage two days after it arrived. Wife is convinced it now contains the Avian Flu. Had to burn it in the back yard. If it helps the two dead birds remained relatively warm and fresh while kept in the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fair enough.
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap cooler. Don't expect Yeti levels of ice preservation; I still had to add ice daily on a trip where the temps were in the high 80s, but I picked it up when the price was at $39.99 so I don't feel like I can complain too much. Very roomy and I like the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: STRONGLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: We went camping and used this cooler from a Thursday until a Sunday. It was in sunlight some of the time but not direct sunlight the entire weekend. This cooler was amazing! It is huge that is for sure!! It held everything that we needed and kept everything nice and cool. On sunday when letting the water out of the side of the cooler we still had ice in it! (and that's after our four year old kept opening it and not shutting it all the way)
customer_reviews.author: Niltilak

customer_reviews.title: Why waste money on a Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Why waste money on a Yeti? Took this camping for 2 days with food, drinks and 3 bags of ice in it plus a frozen milk jug. After I got home I emptied what was left except for 2 cans, some water, and the ice. 3 days later I opened it to find ice cold beverage. Truly is a 5 day cooler for $50 instead of $500. For the price difference I can buy a lot of ice but I haven't found myself needing any more than a few days of cooler use in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT hold ice for 5 days, not even close
customer_reviews.text: I was not optimistic of this claiming to hold ice up to - key words - 5 days, and it did not. Might be a little better than cheaper versions, but i am not impressed. i think the only coolers that will hold this claim are very expensive. A few days, fine, but don't count on this to hold up to its claim
customer_reviews.author: annonymous

customer_reviews.title: We do a lot of camping and have used this ...
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of camping and have used this for two trips now. Holds ice well and keeps things cold. Although, after a weekend (Friday afternoon through Sunday morning) that started with 5 bags of ice, there isn't much ice left.
customer_reviews.author: Diney

customer_reviews.title: One of the Largest Wheeled Coolers Out There
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been in the market for a larger cooler for quite some time, and did a considerable amount of research. From what I found this is the largest wheeled cooler, and can also be carried comfortably. Plenty big to store whatever we need, and doesn't take up the entire back of our SUV. Cooler appears to be well-built, and while I can't predict the future, I expect will hold up well for years to come. Have already used it a few times, and so far so good. Happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I'm giving this cool 5 stars for the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this cool 5 stars for the price and quality. For those who've had coolers in the past will know that this is a good buy. I'm a vendor and use the cooler on a daily basis and it's great for that but I haven't used it on a camping trip and couldn't tell you how long the ice lasts, etc...
customer_reviews.author: crashcourseessay

customer_reviews.title: I love this cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler! We have owned it for 8 months now. It keeps ice for days! Even after the ice melts, the water stays very cold for a few days longer. Excellent for camping trips! The only fall back that I see is that this cooler does not come with a basket for keeping lunch meats (and the like) out of the water. So you need a sealed container to put those sort of things in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. I buy one every year and fill it with local beer and wine for a fundraiser function and it is a big hit. I also have one for myself. I bring my cooler on vacation every year. We are in the car for 15 hours (in the summer) and the food stays cold. It also has wheels and a handle which makes it easy to take to the beach or to the hotel room. The cup holders on the top are nice too.
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy hinges
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Feb. for vacation. Kept it wrapped until 2 wks ago. Unwrapped and loaded up, when I opened the second time the far right hinge broke, not happy😡
customer_reviews.author: Eastham E.

customer_reviews.title: Handles and wheels seem cheap
customer_reviews.text: The handles and wheels seem Poorly made. When full, they may break off easy. It is nice tho that the pull up handle is on the short side to get thru doors easily. If u only use it once in a while it may be a good purchase. We returned this item. Seller was great to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle White

customer_reviews.title: I love the two flaps to open
customer_reviews.text: I know they post the dimensions, but be aware this is a larger than "normal" sized cooler. The wheels are durable (have wheeled it across campus at work full of ice + beverages just fine). I love the two flaps to open!
customer_reviews.author: k10

customer_reviews.title: and keeps cold better than other coolers
customer_reviews.text: A very large, but convenient size. It wheels well, holds a lot, and keeps cold better than other coolers. Also, the side handle is much easier to maneuver than the handle on the back, which many other coolers have.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dille

customer_reviews.title: Large sturdy chest
customer_reviews.text: Nice, large ice chest. Actually it is larger than I wanted. I think it's too large to pick up alone. The one design flaw is that the drain hole isn't at the very bottom so it has to be tilted a good bit to fully drain. Still, it's a good sturdy chest.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy T.

customer_reviews.title: I like the cooler however it doesn't hold ice for 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the cooler however it doesn't hold ice for 5 days. I was camping for 2 days and the ice didn't hold, I needed to replenish the next day and the temp was between 60-70 F.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, that it has a split lid and it's on wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: did not keep my food the 5 days it promised ...
customer_reviews.text: did not keep my food the 5 days it promised The items were thawed and had to throw out or cook the meat NOW in order to save it.
customer_reviews.author: m catherine eaves

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.. took on fishing trip
customer_reviews.text: Worked great..took on fishing trip...ice lasted 3 days (opening frequently in Summer).
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great cooler for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great cooler for a good price. Cant wait to use it. Althought it came dirty, which i am not pleased by.
customer_reviews.author: Gregor2004ua

customer_reviews.title: Hinges will break really easily. Doesn't stay cool as long because of split ...
customer_reviews.text: Hinges will break really easily. Doesn't stay cool as long because of split lid.
customer_reviews.author: GEMD

customer_reviews.title: and it kept drinks cool for at least 48 hours
customer_reviews.text: You can put a lot in here. I had it outside on 100 degree days, and it kept drinks cool for at least 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: D Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, wheeled handle is great, wheels are large enough to go over gravel easily.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bee

customer_reviews.title: 2nd day use and the hinge broke
customer_reviews.text: Here in Hawaii it kept my ice for 4 days. I just can't believe it. I just used this cooler for the second time and the hinge broke.
customer_reviews.author: ARLEY NOZAWA

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Lid already broke off , screws pulled out when I opened the lid
customer_reviews.author: Juli T

customer_reviews.title: love the handle/wheels
customer_reviews.text: Keeps ice for a few days, love the handle/wheels. Quite large, if you have a car check measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahw285

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This thing kept ice as ice for days, it's pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Moonie

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.text: Kept things cold for our 10+ hour move during the middle of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: 5 Furry Moochers

customer_reviews.title: great on size - but the drain hole is half ...
customer_reviews.text: great on size - but the drain hole is half way up the side of the cooler - so you have to stand it on end to drain. other than that - it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Ima Letufinish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent cooler, large , but easy to move with the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ice melts after two days and it was in the house not outside where its hot
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a bit awkward to pull when full. Its ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit awkward to pull when full. Its very heavy! If the handle was longer, it would be much easier to pull.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bunting

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big and capable of holding and keeping cool the bear all night long!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chibela

customer_reviews.title: brand new, broke in less then 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I used the cooler for the first time today. I had one layer of waters, pop ("soda" for you weirdos who call it that) and some ice in the cooler. It was maybe 1/3rd full. I picked the cooler up and the white handle snapped like it was nothing. Not happy. I know this is a cheaper cooler but that doesn't mean it should break on its first use.
customer_reviews.author: w.v

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what we were looking for. easy to roll & just right for our longer trips.
customer_reviews.author: LCP

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid DuraChill Wheeled 5-Day Cooler, 75 Quarts, Blue 1836574
product_meta.description: This rolling cooler has extra thick insulation that keeps ice frozen up to 5 days even in temperatures up to 90 degrees Fahrenheit. Large size accommodates up to 130 cans plus ice. The rugged wheels make maneuvering this travel cooler over multiple surfaces easy. Portable cooler is great for camping, picnics, tailgating, or any party. Durable metal and plastic extended tow handle, drain for easy draining of liquids. Side swing handles with comfort grip to easily carry this cooler with wheels. Built-in cup holders fit both 12-ounce cans and 20-ounce bottles. Rubbermaid extreme 5-day wheeled ice chest / cooler, blue, 75-quart (fg2c0902modbl).
feature_bullets: This rolling cooler has extra thick insulation that keeps ice frozen up to 5 days even in temperatures up to 90 degrees Fahrenheit
Large size accommodates up to 130 cans plus ice; The rugged wheels make maneuvering this travel cooler over multiple surfaces easy
